sentences.cn: 山楂能做出诱人的果酱.

sentences.en: I loved the smell of cork grease and slide oil, of musty woolen uniforms, and the tangy dankness of brassy horn bells.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢闻松脂和黑色润滑油味道，喜欢闻羊毛制服的霉味和潮湿的黄铜喇叭的扑鼻气味。

sentences.en: Jennifer: And they have tangy, freshly - made salsa , too.
sentences.cn: 珍妮花: 而且他们还有香辣的现做辣酱.

sentences.en: Soft and ripe, with tangy pear, fig, apple and spice flavors that linger on the palate.
sentences.cn: 柔软的和成熟的, 藉由强烈的西洋梨子, 无花果, 苹果和香料在上颚上逗留,其中滋味久久不能散去.

sentences.en: Succulent salmon covered in sweet, luscious , tangy fruits and baked in a pineapple shell.
sentences.cn: 多汁的三文鱼在菠萝中煎烤,点缀着酸甜, 清爽, 回味无穷的水果.

sentences.en: The smoky, tangy flavor associated with gutter oil can do wonders to simple, everyday dishes.
sentences.cn: 用地沟油做成的菜香气扑鼻，能使简单的家常菜拥有意想不到的味道。

sentences.en: The tea goes with this tangy lemon tart perfectly.
sentences.cn: 这种茶配上这种香味扑鼻的柠檬塔非常完美。

sentences.en: They taste tart and sweet and tangy.
sentences.cn: 尝起来辛辣,甜甜的,浓浓的气味.

sentences.en: We love its thick , creamy texture and tangy taste.
sentences.cn: 酸奶有柔滑的质地,浓郁的味道.

words.tran_cn: 发出铿锵声；发出当的一声
扑鼻的；有刺激性的；强烈的

trans.tran_cn: 味道浓烈的，扑鼻的，有刺激性的
